attributes.action: Stop the misuse of public money by MPs unethically claiming housing allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of parliament who predominately live in large houses in London should not be allowed to buy a cheap house in their constituency and claim that it is their main residence and claim thousands of pounds of taxpayers money for the London property.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
